name: VISITING THE NORTH KOREAN BORDER
description:
Whilst visiting South Korea I got the chance to visit the border with North Korea. The DMZ is separation between the two Koreas and one of the most heavily fortified areas on earth. Come with me on this tour within the DMZ, you'll see into North Korea, the freedom bridge, international Korea railway station and an infiltration tunnel. 

This was quite the experience and I would recommend this whilst visiting Seoul as it's a half day tour. A truly unique opportunity. 

Music Used
Song: Panuma - Skin (Metro Remix) (Vlog No Copyright Music)
Music provided by Vlog No Copyright Music.
